name: Acchiappa Monete
overview: In this interesting/unique Italian language take on Kaboom, you are a beggar in the presence of your king. Your goal is to recover the largest number of coin sacks that the good king will throw you from the walls of his beautiful castle. You will have to be very careful not to get hit by them because their weight will kill you instantly. Pay attention also to the killer eagle who will try to scratch you with its poisoned claws.To move the beggar, use the cursor keys. Published by Gruppo Ediitoriale Jackson in Videobasic #10.
